text: <@U014A8JD9DH> No, for the position we need someone with a good background in handling and managing integrations as well as supporting our implementation team with support areas that require the use of code among others, hence why they are highlighted in the description as well as languages and localization. There are HubSpot developers who can also orchestrate actions in all Hubs, but well all companies have their standards of work and recruitment.
